name: @elizaos/rust
description: elizaOS Core - Rust runtime and types

scripts.build:wasm: wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg/web --no-default-features --features wasm && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir pkg/node --no-default-features --features wasm
scripts.lint: cargo clippy --all-targets --features native --fix --allow-dirty --allow-staged -- -D warnings && cargo fmt

author: elizaOS
